content.rendered: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vestibulum sagittis orci ac odio dictum tincidunt. Donec ut metus leo. Class aptent taciti sociosqu ad litora torquent per conubia nostra, per inceptos himenaeos. Sed luctus, dui eu sagittis sodales, nulla nibh sagittis augue, vel porttitor diam enim non metus. Vestibulum aliquam augue neque. Phasellus tincidunt odio eget ullamcorper efficitur. Cras placerat ut turpis pellentesque vulputate. Nam sed consequat tortor. Curabitur finibus sapien dolor. Ut eleifend tellus nec erat pulvinar dignissim. Nam non arcu purus. Vivamus et massa massa.

excerpt.rendered:
Part of the Tuscan Collection the Omerta Wallace Crew is a subtle nod to those Italian Mafia films we grew up watching. The Omerta Crew features the original ILU Omerta illustration, a minimal line-art illustration with bold type, screen-printed on the front centre. The Omerta Wallace Crew is a drop shoulder crew designed to have a slightly oversized fit and feel. Cut from a premium cotton and features ribbed cuffs. Sophisticated simplicity with a twist.

– Tonal word logo on the outside of left bicep
– Mid length
– Back vent
– Front pockets
– Concealed button placket
– Button opening
– Internal welt pocket
– Fully lined with contrast houndstooth patterned lining
– Showerproof fabric with PU backing
– Model: 185cm (6ft) // 75kg (165lbs) // 31″ Waist // Wears: Medium
